title: See How Crops Get Picked Super Fast by Machines!

tasks.task: Operating a mechanical harvester for cabbage farming.
subtasks: Traverse the farmland using the harvester.
Engage the rotating metal spindles mechanism.
Ensure even coverage across multiple acres daily.
Monitor the harvester's front unit operation.
Adjust the machine settings for optimal harvest.

tasks.task: Ensuring minimal cabbage damage during mechanical harvesting.
subtasks: Adjust the harvester’s spindles for gentle contact.
Regularly inspect the machine’s running status.
Calibrate the speed to prevent overshooting plants.

tasks.task: Comparing manual workforce to mechanical harvesting efficiency.
subtasks: Calculate the number of acres harvested per day by a manual workforce.
Determine the volume covered by the harvester per day.
Assess time savings and workforce reduction.

tasks.task: Overall, operating a mechanical harvester involves moving the machine across the field, managing equipment settings, and ensuring crop damage is minimized compared to manual labor.
